participant_1.background:
I have breakfast with my brothers and talk about our day.
I love the wedding planning process and get a thrill out of helping people create their dream weddings.
I've been single my whole life, but I'm hoping to find someone special one day.
I usually dye my hair with natural colors, but I'm open to trying new things.
I remember playing street hockey with my friends in the summer.

participant_2.background:
I do not have kids because I enjoy my quiet life with my cat.
i like to wear black.
I am proud of my passion for swimming and how it has helped me to stay healthy and active.
I am a baker trying to find my way in life.
i have a brown belt in karate.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I am a baker, trying to find my way in life.
Nice, I have always wanted to be a baker.
What's stopping you?
I am a wedding planner and love helping people create their dream weddings.
Wow, that sounds like a really fun job!
It is! I have breakfast with my brothers and talk about our day.
That sounds really nice. Do you have any siblings?
I have two brothers and I love them to death!
I have a cat and I love him to death!
Aww, cats are so cute. I've always wanted one.
You should get one! They are so much fun.
I might have to! I love animals.
Me too! I am proud of my passion for swimming and how it has helped me to stay healthy and active.
That's awesome! I love swimming too! I used to play street hockey with my friends in the summer.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I used to play basketball when I was younger.
I do not have any kids because I enjoy my quiet life with my cat.
That's cool. I do not have any kids either. I am happy with my life just the way it is.
Me too! I love my life.
I am glad to hear that
